main event: A bright red object the size of a pea with spikes was reported, moving towards the horizon for a duration of 15 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on November 8, 1957 in Los Angeles, California., The object was observed for 15 minutes., The observer described it as a bright red object with spikes., Possible explanations included a balloon or Venus., A military officer checked the report and observed nothing unusual, only a bright star.
witness description: observer reported seeing the object in the sky
